Instruction: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
Place chicken in the preheated oven and bake until fully cooked and the juices run clear, about 25 to 30 minutes.
Slice the chicken and serve with your choice of toppings, such as cilantro, lime wedges, or avocado.
The nutrition data for this recipe accounts for the total amount of marinade ingredients. The actual consumption of the marinade will differ.
